entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 17 except 9 along parts of the coast.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm.
